description: Swaths of pale blue silk hang loosely from the wrought iron frame of this three-sided pavilion.  The abandoned lighthouse in the distance provides a stark juxtaposition to the pristine interior of the establishment.  Plush carpets of a deep indigo color cover the floor, while a long low table set against the far wall displays the shop's wares.  Small paper lanterns provide a warm ambiance and ample light in which to peruse the merchandise.

Swaths of pale blue silk hang loosely from the wrought iron frame of this three-sided pavilion.  The lonely light of the abandoned lighthouse in the distance provides a stark juxtaposition to the pristine interior of the establishment.  Plush carpets of a deep indigo color cover the floor, while a long low table set against the far wall displays the shop's wares.  Small paper lanterns provide a warm ambiance and ample light in which to peruse the merchandise.
title: [New Escapes, Showroom]
